lead_paragraph: MACHT--Stanley H.,on January 22, 2016. Beloved husband of Susan. Loving father of Richard (Bonnie), the late Elliot (Debra), Roger, Alma (Adrienne), Cynthia (Mark) and Emily (Tim). Cherished grandfather of nine and great-grandfather of three. Fond brother of Norman, the late Malcolm, the late Ronald and the late Neil. Graveside Service 1pm, Monday January 25, 2016 at Mt Ararat Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY. The family will sit Shiva at their residence, 1443 Beacon St., Brookline, MA, Tuesday, January 26 and Wednesday January 27 from 1pm -3pm and 6pm-9pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MACHT, STANLEY H.
